Release Release 0.5.0 - 2012-07-01

TypeChangesBy

Added fix for forked lifecylce of maven-jar-plugin. Updated changes, clean, compiler plugin. Updated appassembler plugin to 1.2.2 and fixed dependency type for log4j.Karl Heinz Marbaise

Release Release 0.4.0 - 2012-05-01

TypeChangesBy

Added missing plugin: javadoc.Karl Heinz Marbaise

Release Release 0.3.0 - 2012-01-18

TypeChangesBy

Upgrades maven-surefire, maven-failsafe-plugin. Fixed wrong groupId/artifactId of the appassembler-maven-plugin. Introduced properties for the plugin versions.Karl Heinz Marbaise

Release Release 0.2.0 - 2011-04-17

TypeChangesBy

log4j added, testng dependency updated to 6.0.1 and added some plugins to the pluginManagement section (maven-surefire-plugin updated to 2.8.1; added maven-failsafe-plugin, maven-appassembler-plugin) moved dependencies to dependencyManagement section.Karl Heinz Marbaise

Release Release 0.1.0 - 2011-01-08

TypeChangesBy

The first public release.Karl Heinz Marbaise
